title: Save the refugees
content: our reward. Ruth will give you a Rune of the Wolf. Use it to open the secret room in enclave library. Place the Wolf Rune, then activate all the runes will open the entrance to Hidden Vault. There you can find Sorrow (Rare 2-handed Melee Weapon), Robe of Summer (Rare Clothing) and Wyvern Poison (Rare potion, coat weapon). Rest at camp, join the celebration if you helped the Tieflings.
